page.title: 03MY SCHOOL DAY
page.content: My name is Diana.I am nine years old. I get up at 7.ooam.and go to the bathroom and wash.Then I get dressed and go downstairs for my breakfast.I usually have cereal,a cup of tea and toast.Then I put on my coat and get into the car to go to school.My dad gets in and so does my brother.We go down the road to fetch Jonathan and Karen.We go back up the road and stop for Matthew, then we go to school. At school we have some play, then we have Assembly and I play my recorder. After Assembly we do News, Maths and English.I have a school lunch then play.We have different lessons in the afternoon and then dad fetches us at 3.30pm. When I arrive home I have tea and watch T.V. I go to bed at 8.30pm. and read until 9.00pm then go to sleep.
